meanings.definition: A family of primates that includes orangutans, gorillas, chimpanzees, and bonobos.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring pongids from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study pongids to learn more about their behavior and social structures.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pongids at the sanctuary played a prank on the caretaker by hiding his keys.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of knowledge, pongids swing from tree to tree, gathering wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the intelligence of the pongids as they solved puzzles with ease.
